title: [Large-scale] Leadership Storytelling Integrating Sustainability and Employment Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Core sustainability concepts and corporate leadership experience
context.additional_context: Competency development program for corporate managers/leaders, integrating sustainability and employability skills via mobile-accessible microlearning modules

learning_goals: Participants can operationalize ESG strategies within organizations by applying sustainability-related storytelling techniques
Learners can design personalized career development roadmaps by analyzing and mapping job competencies linked to SDGs objectives
Trainees acquire methods to articulate sustainability competencies and apply them to corporate decision-making processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
